remarks: Write the totally ordered set structure predicate in terms of the proper class strict order predicate.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.)
statement:
tosso.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
tosso.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
tosso.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
tosso $p |- ( K e. V -> ( K e. Toset <-> ( .< Or B /\ ( _I |` B ) C_ .<_ ) ) ) $.
